title: Cant earn snowdown tokens anymore?
body:
I was so close to getting akali and now i cant buy them or earn them? I thought they went away on the 21st??
Is there a way i can just buy the rest? I never bought any of the bundles I was planning to if i wasng going to be able to earn enough before the event ended
Edit: I sent a ticket in and a rioter let me buy the bundle. Thank you so much! I now I have KDA Prestige Akali!
